alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:49PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook and east central Lake Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gunflint Lake, to Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to Tofte, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eagle Mountain around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Grand Marais and Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness North of the Gunflint Trail. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
